All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AnalyzerUtil
The AnalyzerUtil class provides various utility methods for text analysis, including tokenization, loading of synonym and dictionary lists, and loading of Apache OpenNLP models.
BodyField
Represents a Field for containing the body of a document.
ConfigProperties
The ConfigProperties class is used to load and retrieve properties from a configuration file for a search engine application.
ConfigProperties.Language
Defining an enumeration type Language for the language options.
ConfigProperties.SimilarityName
The SimilarityName enum is defining a set of possible values for the type of similarity to be used in this system.
ConfigProperties.StemmerName
The StemmerName enum is defining a set of possible values for the type of stemmer to be used in this system.
DirectoryIndexer
Indexes documents processing a whole directory tree.
DocumentParser
Represents a document parser.
EnglishLongEvalAnalyzer
The EnglishLongEvalAnalyzer class is an implementation of the Analyzer class in Java that performs text analysis on English text, including tokenization, filtering, and stemming.
FrenchLongEvalAnalyzer
The FrenchLongEvalAnalyzer class is used to create a set of token stream components for analyzing French text, including a tokenizer, filters for folding, elision, stop words, and stemming.
LongEvalParser
Provides a very basic parser for the LongEval corpus.
LongEvalRetrieval
IR system using ApacheLucene for the LongEval-Retrieval task.
LongEvalTopicsReader
Read LongEval topics.
ParsedDocument
Represents a parsed document to be indexed.
ParsedDocument.FIELDS
The names of the Fields within the index.
PositionFilter
The PositionFilter class is a TokenFilter that adjusts the position increment of tokens in a TokenStream.
Searcher
Searches a document collection.
ShingleAnalyzer
The ShingleAnalyzer class is a Java class that creates a token stream for a given text by breaking it into shingles of a specified size.
SynonymAnalyzer
The SynonymAnalyzer class is a Java class that analyzes text by replacing synonyms, removing stop words, and flattening the resulting graph.
SynonymPOSAnalyzer
The SynonymPOSAnalyzer class is a Java class that extends the Analyzer class and uses OpenNLP OpenNLPTokenizer and OpenNLPPOSFilter to analyze text and also includes a custom synonym filter.
SynonymPOSFilter
The SynonymPOSFilter class is a Java implementation of a token filter that uses WordNet to find synonyms of input tokens based on their part-of-speech tags.
